column1: Was it task based MRI or resting state MRI?

column8: Important to assess subject fatigue. If differing by subject, specify summary statistics (ean, range and/or standard deviation)
column27: IMPORTANT IF META-ANALYSIS ON SYNDROME WITH HIGH LEVEL OF FATIGUE. MIGHT BE CONSIDER AS EXCLUSION CRITERIA

column1: What method was used for optimization?
How was the equipment was synched to the scanner?
Effect size used for the power calculation (magnitude and standard deviation)
The type of outcome used as the basis of power computations

column8: previous literature with citation; pilot data with description
column27: IMPORTANT FOR ANALYSIS WITH SOFTWARE LIKE SDM

column8: uncorrected alpha 0.05 for an ROI | FWE­corrected alpha 0.05
column10: uncorrected alpha 0.05 for an ROI | FWE­ corrected alpha 0.05 | other

column27: IMPORTNAT FOR SUB-ANALYSIS (SEE CONA and SCARPAZZA 2019)
